Meanings: همچنین اختصار آن بصورت «md» نیز بکار برده می‌شود
Milling Casing work on , actions or job's abbreviation which Companymans write in their daily drilling reports
میل نمودن لوله‌های جداره ای یا حفاری آن با مته ای بنام میل
اختصار در مورد عملیاتی است که در حال انجام است و در گزارش‌ها مورد استفاده قرار می‌گیرد
moving out, also write as : MO
Mill Obstruction, actions or job's abbreviation which Companymans write in their daily drilling reports
وسیله ای که جلوی میل کردن را گرفته
اختصار در مورد عملیاتی است که در حال انجام است و در گزارش‌ها مورد استفاده قرار می‌گیرد
برپایی وسایل یا ابزار جهت شروع عملیات
A Workover Rig, usually lightweight, that is specially built to run a string of ¾ inch or
inch tubing. See also : Macaroni String
A String of Tubing or Pipe, usually ¾ or 1 inch in diameter
A metal that has the property of attracting ferrous and certain other metals to it
ARM INSPECTION CALIPER LOG, Log Curve name
To attach a joint of drill pipe onto the drill stem suspended in the wellbore to permit deepening the wellbore by the length of the joint added, about 30 feet, or 9 meters
بیرون کشیدن ساق حفاری از چاه و انجام دادن دوباره لوله پایین
To hoist the drill stem out of the Well to perform one of a number of operations such as changing Bits, taking a Core, and so forth, and then to return the drill stem to the Well
To make up connection one more turn

M/U, 1. To assemble and join parts to form a complete unit e.g., to make up a string of casing . 2. To screw together two threaded pieces. 3. To mix or prepare e.g., to make up a tank of Mud . 4. To compensate for, e.g.: to make up for lost time
برپایی وسایل یا ابزار جهت شروع عملیات
To screw a length of pipe into another length of pipe
نیروی مورد نیاز جهت سفت و محکم نمودن یک لوله به لوله دیگر تا در هنگام عملیات حفاری باز نگردند

A device that is attached to the shaft of the drawworks and used as a power source for screwing together joints of pipe. It is usually located on the driller's side of the Drawworks. Also called : Spinning Cathead. See also : Cathead
A connection with the threads on the outside
A cylindrical bar, Spindle, or Shaft around which other parts are arranged or attached or that fits inside a cylinder or tube

An accessory system of piping to a main piping system or another conductor that serves to divide a flow into several parts, to combine several flows into one, or to reroute a flow to any one of several possible destinations. 2. A pipe fitting with several side outlets to connect it with other pipes. 3. A fitting on an internal combustion engine made to receive exhaust gases from several cylinders
که معمولا جهت اندازه گیری ویسکوزیته گل حفاری در محل دکل بکار می‌رود
An oil or gas Well the production of which is so limited in relation to production costs that profit approaches the vanishing point
Ml, also rarely write as : Mrl
سنگی که دارای 50 درصد آهک و 50 درصد رس است
A calibrated Funnel used in field tests to determine the viscosity of drilling Mud
که معمولا جهت اندازه گیری ویسکوزیته گل حفاری در محل دکل بکار می‌رود

Commonly called : The Funnel Viscosity. The Marsh Funnel Viscosity is reported as the number of seconds required for a given fluid to flow 1 qt through the Marsh Funnel. In some areas, the efflux quantity is 1,000 cc. See API
RP13B for instructions. See also : Kinematic Viscosity

A portable derrick that is capable of being erected as a unit, as distinguished from a standard derrick that cannot be raised to a working position as a unit. For transporting by land, the mast can be divided into two or more sections to avoid excessive length extending from truck beds on the highway. Compare with : Derrick

A device that fits into the rotary table to accommodate the slips and drive the kelly bushing so that the rotating motion of the rotary table can be transmitted to the kelly. Also called : Rotary Bushing
The valve on the choke and flow line that is nearest to the preventer assembly. Its purpose is to stop the flow through the choke and flow line
A Manifold system of valves, usually situated at the power source, which may be operated manually, or by Remote Control to direct pressurized fluid to closing devices at Wellhead
A large valve used to shut in a Well
A large valve located on the Christmas tree and used to control the flow of oil and gas from a well. Also called master gate. 2. The Blind or Blank Rams of a Blow
ma, also rarely write as : mtrx
To obtain an accurate measurement of the depth reached in a well by measuring the drill pipe or tubing as it is run into the Well
To measure drill pipe or tubing as it is pulled out of the hole, usually to determine the depth of the well or the depth to which the pipe or tubing was run

A percussion tool operated mechanically to give an upward thrust to a fish by the sudden release of a tripping device inside the tool. if the fish can e freed by an upward blow, the Mechanical Jar can be very effective. Also called : a Hydraulic Jar
A drilling rig in which the source of power is one or more internal
combustion engines and in which the power is distributed to rig components through mechanical devices, such as chains, sprockets, clutches, and shafts . Also called : a Power Rig
medium, also write as : md, and use this abbreviation for median
med, use this abbreviation mostly for : median , mostly use : md
Sand particles with size between 0.25 mm
A measure of fineness of a woven material, screen, or sieve; e.g.: a
mesh sieve has 200 openings per linear inch. A
mesh screen with a wire diameter of 0.0021 in. 0.0533 mm has an opening of 0.074 mm, or will pass a particle of 74 μ. See also : Micron
آبی که پس از نفوذ گل حفاری در سازند از مواد جامد جدا می‌گردد
فونل یا قیف استانداردی که جهت اندازه گیری میزان ویسکوزیته گل حفاری در محل دکل حفاری توسط مهندس گل حفاری بکار می‌رود
که جهت اندازه گیری اشباع سازند و سایر داده‌ها در نزدیکی دیوارە چاه بکار می‌رود
که جهت اندازه گیری اشباع سازند و سایر داده‌ها در نزدیکی دیوارە چاه بکار می‌رود
millionth of a meter, a metric unit of measure of length equal to 0.000001 meter or 0.001 millimeter
The movement of oil from the area in which it was formed to a reservoir rock where it can accumulate
Milling Run, operation's Abbreviations which Companymans write in their daily drilling reports
اختصار در مورد عملیاتی است که در حال انجام است و در گزارش‌ها مورد استفاده قرار می‌گیرد
mky, also rarely write as : mlky
mlky, also mostly write as : mky
All the operations necessary for Milling material in Well, Casing Mill

Out. From making up till lay down milling assembly include accompanied trip in/out. circulating besides the milling operation, Operations' abbreviation which usually Companymans write in their daily drilling reports

A downhole tool with rough, sharp, extremely hard cutting surfaces for removing metal by grinding or cutting. Mills are run on drill pipe or tubing to grind up debris in the hole, remove stuck portions of drill stem or sections of casing for sidetracking, and ream out tight spots in the casing. They are also called : Junk Mills, Reaming Mills, and so forth, depending on what use they have
M/C, actions or jobs' Abbreviations which Companymans write in their daily drilling reports
میل نمودن یا حفاری لوله‌های جداری
معمولا اختصار این لغت در مورد عملیاتی بکار میرود که در حال انجام است و در گزارش‌ها مورد استفاده قرار می‌گیرد
M/O, actions or jobs' abbreviations which Companymans write in their daily drilling reports
بوجود آمدن مانع جهت جلوگیری از میل کردن
معمولا اختصار این لغت در مورد عملیاتی بکار میرود که در حال انجام است و در گزارش‌ها مورد استفاده قرار می‌گیرد
To use a Mill on the end of a workstring to remove a permanent tool or Fish
A unit of Permeability of a rock Formation; one
thousandth of a darcy. See also Darcy
A unit of Permeability of a rock Formation; one
thousandth of a darcy. See also Darcy
MLG, actions or jobs which Companymans write in their daily drilling reports
عملیات میل کردن یا حفاری مانده درون چاه
معمولا اختصار این لغت در مورد عملیاتی بکار میرود که در حال انجام است و در گزارش‌ها مورد استفاده قرار می‌گیرد
MIL, operations' or job's abbreviations which Companymans write in their daily drilling reports
عملیات جهت میل نمودن یا حفاری وسیله مانده در چاه
معمولا اختصار این لغت در مورد عملیاتی بکار میرود که در حال انجام است و در گزارش‌ها مورد استفاده قرار می‌گیرد
The tool used in the operation of Milling. See also : Mill
اختصار در مورد عملیاتی است که در حال انجام است و در گزارش‌ها مورد استفاده قرار می‌گیرد
mnl, also refer to as : mnrl
Any naturally occurring homogeneous solid material which has a definite, but not fixed chemical composition and a distinctive internal Crystal structure

Minerals are usually formed by Inorganic processes. Synthetic equivalants of various Minerals, such as Emeralds and Diamonds, are manufactured for commercial purposes. Although most of the Minerals are chemical compounds, a small number, e.g., Sulfur, Copper, Gold are elements. Minerals combine with each other to form rocks. For example, Granite consists of the minerals Feldspar, Quartz, Mica, and Amphibole in varying amounts. Rocks are generally, therefore, an intergrowth of various minerals
A Well completion in which the production casing is less than 4.5 inches in diameter. Compare also with : Conventional Completion
گاهی اوقات برای کوچک نیز بکار برده می‌شود
recovery process which involves the injection of a solvent followed by a displacing fluid
A method of secondary recovery of fluids from a reservoir by injection of fluids that are miscible with the reservoir fluids
A drilling technique that uses air or gas to which a foaming agent has been added
Mud Logging, A company with special equipments which perform data acquisition from an oil & gas Well
شرکتی که با ابزار خاص اطلاعات را در حین حفاری چاههای نفت و گاز ثبت می‌نماید
مارن: سنگی است که 50% آن آهک و 50% آن نیز از رس تشکیل گردیده است
Milling Operation, actions or job's abbreviations which Companymans write in their daily drilling reports
این اختصار در مورد عملیاتی بکار میرود که در حال انجام است و در گزارش‌ها مورد استفاده قرار می‌گیرد
Time actually spent for Milling operations, Windows junk casing . Rotating time of the Mill Bit, Operations' abbreviation which usually Companymans write in their daily drilling reports
Microlaterolog, mostly write with capital letters as : MLL
لاگ جانبی میکرو منظور راندن لاگی است که در فاصله نزدیک به دیوارە چاه است
نیمه شب: تمامی گزارش‌های حفاری از نیمه شب گذشته تا نیمه شب بعدی تنظیم می‌گردند
در گزارش‌های حفاری گزارش‌ها تا نیمه شب تنظیم می‌شوند
mineral, also rarely refer to as : mnrl
mineral, also usually refer to as : mnl
گاهی اوقات برای کوچک نیز بکار برده می‌شود

A drilling rig that is used exclusively to drill offshore exploration and development wells and that floats upon the surface of the water when being moved from one drill site to another. It may or may not float once drilling begins. Two basic types of mobile offshore drilling units are used to drill most offshore wildcat wells: bottom
supported drilling rigs and floating drilling rigs

Workover equipment designed in equipment packages or modules that are light enough to be lifted onto an offshore platform by a platform crane. In most cases, the maximum weight of a module of 12,000 pounds. Once lifted from the work boat, the rig can be erected and working within twenty

The derrickman's working platform. As pipe of tubing is run into or out of the hole, the derrickman must handle the top end of the pipe, which may be as high as 90 feet 27 m in the derrick or mast. The monkeyboard provide a small platform to raise him to the proper height for handling the top of the pipe
A Clay mineral often used as an additive to drilling mud. It is a hydrous aluminum silicate capable of reacting with such substances of magnesium and calcium. See also : Bentonite
منظور سنگی است که دارای تخلخلی بالاتر از 12 درصد است
در گزارش‌های حفاری معمولا گزارش را تا 7 صبح تنظیم می‌نمایند
مسیول موتور برق: که در همه حالت مراقب وضعیت ژنراتور برق است
همچنین به کمک مکانیک نیز اطلاق می‌گردد
در ایران به شخصی که مسیول موتور برق است گویند
A Fishing tool used to recover a parted string of sucker rods from a Well
وارد نمودن مواد حفاری به داخل چاه
معمولا بصورت اختصار MIM بکار می‌رود
معمولا بصورت اختصار MIR بکار می‌رود
وارد نمودن ابزار استاندارد به محوطه دکل
معمولا بصورت اختصار MIST بکار می‌رود
وارد نمودن ابزار به داخل چاه
معمولا بصورت اختصار MIT بکار می‌رود
MAGNETIC RESONANCE IMAGING LOG, Log Curve name
اختصار بکار رفته برای سنگی که دارای 50 درصد آهک و 50 درصد رس است
Marl Mrl , also write as : Ml
سنگی که از 50 درصد آهک و 50 درصد رس تشکیل شده است
MICRO SPHERICALLY FOCUS LOG, Log Curve name
Micro Spherical Focused Log, mostly write with capital letters as : MSFL
لاگ جانبی میکرو اسفریکال منظور در فاصله نزدیک به دیوارە چاه است
البته بیشتر با حروف بزرگ بصورت MSFL نوشته می‌شود
MULTI SHOT SURVEY, Log Curve name
هنگام صبح: که زمان گزارش عملیات حفاری به مرکز است که معمولا ساعت 7 بامداد می‌باشد
در گزارش‌های حفاری معمولا گزارش را تا 7 صبح تنظیم می‌نمایند
Lost time due to Loss of Circulation, Operations' abbreviation which usually Companymans write in their daily drilling reports
اختصار آن بصورت «md» یا «m» نوشته می‌گردد

The liquid circulated through the wellbore during rotary drilling and workover operations. In addition to its function of bringing cuttings to the surface, drilling mud cools and lubricates the bit and drill stem, protects against blowouts by holding back subsurface pressures, and deposits a mud cake on the wall of the borehole to prevent loss of fluids to the Formation. See also : Drilling Fluid
Any material added to drilling fluid to change some of its characteristics or properties
The process of pumping mud downward to the bit and back up tot he surface in a drilling or workover operation. See also : Normal Circulation, Reverse Circulation
Weight per unit volume of drilling fluid usually expressed in pounds per gallon or pounds per cubic foot. See also : Hydrostatic Pressure
شخصی که مسیول ساختن و تهیە سیال حفاری است
A person on the Rig site which is responsible for making Mud for Drilling
An employee of a drilling fluid supply company whose duty it is to test and maintain the drilling mud properties that are specified by the operator
آبی که پس از نفوذ گل حفاری در سازند از مواد جامد جدا می‌گردد
A device that removes gas from the mud coming out of a well when a kick is being circulated out
خرطومی کلی که گل حفاری را بدرون رشته حفاری هدایت می‌نماید
خرطومی گل یا خرطومی دورانی جهت هدایت گل حفاری از درون پمپهای گل بداخل استند پایپ و هرز گرد و کلی
همچنین به لغت Kelly Hose و Rotary Hose مراجعه شود
The hose on a Rotary Drilling Rig that conducts the Drilling Fluid from the Mud Pumps and Standpipe into the Swivel and Kelly, also called the Rotary Hose or the Kelly Hose
Also called : Kelly Hose or Rotary Hose. See also : Rotary Hose
Structure at the rig to store and shelter sacked materials used in drilling fluids

Substances generally regarded as drilling mud contaminants, such as salt and calcium sulfate, are called inhibitors when purposely added to mud so that the filtrate from the drilling fluid will prevent or retard the hydration of Formation Clays shells
A record of information derived from examination of drilling fluid and drill bit cuttings. See also : Mud Logging
کسانی که ثبت داده‌های مربوط به حفاری را بتوسط کامپیوتر انجام می‌دهند
Mud Logging, A company with special equipments which perform data acquisition from an oil & gas Well
The recording of information derived from examination and analysis of formation cuttings made by the bit and of mud circulated out of the hole. A portion of the mud is diverted through a gas

detecting device. Cuttings brought up by the mud are examined under ultraviolet light to detect the presence of oil or gas. Mud logging is often carried out in a portable laboratory set up at the Well
که بداخل سازند یا حفره‌های درون زمین وارد شده و از دست می‌رود

An open pit dug in the ground to hold drilling fluid or waste materials discarded after the treatment of drilling mud. For some drilling operations, mud pits are used for suction to the mud pumps, settling of mud sediments, and storage of reserve mud. Steel tanks are much more commonly used for these purposes now, but they are still sometimes referred to as pits

A plan or procedure, with respect to depth, for the type and properties of drilling fluid to be used in drilling a well. Some factors that influence the mud program are the casing program and such formation characteristics as type, competence, solubility, temperature, and pressure
pressure reciprocating pump used to circulate the mud on a drilling rig. A typical mud pump is a two
acting piston pump whose pistons travel in replaceable liners and are driven by a crankshaft actuated by an engine or a motor. Also called : a Slush Pump
PMP, actions or job's abbreviations which Companymans write in their daily drilling reports
که معمولا 2 عدد می‌باشند و ندرتا 3 پمپ گل نیز مورد استفاده قرار می‌گیرد

A trough or pipe that is placed between the surface connections at the wellbore and the shale shaker and through which drilling mud flows upon its return to the surface from the hole. Also called : Flow Line
که بصورت پوند بر فوت مکعب بیان می‌شود

A measure of the density of a drilling fluid expressed as pounds per gallon, pounds per cubic foot, or kilograms per cubic meter. Mud weight is directly related to the amount of pressure the column of drilling mud exerts at the bottom of the hole
An instrument installed in the mud pits that has a recorder mounted on the rig floor to provide a continuous reading of the Mud Weight
مواد جامدی که بر اثر فیلتر شدن سیال حفاری روی دیواره چاه باقی می‌ماند و از ورود سیال سازند بدرون چاه جلوگیری می‌نماید

A device that continually measures and may record the flow rate of mud returning from the annulus and flowing out of the mud return line. If the mud does not flow at a fairly constant rate, a kick or lost circulation may have occurred
A rock with grains quantity less than 10 % , Mud size less than 20 μ , Dunham Classification of Carbonate rocks
Quantity of Grains < 10%; Mud size < 20 μ
سنگی که کلا دارای دانه کمتر از 10 درصد بوده و دارای گل آهکی فراوان با اندازه کوچکتر از 20 میکرون میباشد و بهنگام رسوبگذاری قطعات آن بیکدیگر متصل نشده اند
To add solid materials, such as Bentonite or other Clay to a drilling fluid composed mainly of clear water to obtain certain desirable properties
An arrangement for producing a well in which one wellbore penetrates two or more petroleum

bearing formations. In one type, multiple tubing strings are suspended side by side in the production casing string, each a different length and each packed to prevent the commingling of different reservoir fluids. Each reservoir is then produced through its own tubing string. Alternatively, a small
diameter production casing string may be provided for each reservoir, as in Multiple Miniaturized or Multiple Tubingless Completions
A Well equipped to produce oil and/or gas separately from more than one reservoir
نیروی مورد نیاز جهت سفت و محکم نمودن یک لوله به لوله دیگر تا در هنگام عملیات حفاری باز نگردند
وزن گل: که بر حسب پوند بر فوت مکعب بیان می‌گردد
